siteConfig.bodyScript: (function(){console.log('[Mermaid] Script wrapper executing');const init=()=>{console.log('[Mermaid] Init function called, readyState:',document.readyState);try{const s=document.createElement('script');console.log('[Mermaid] Script element created');s.type='module';s.textContent=`import mermaid from 'https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/mermaid@11/dist/mermaid.esm.min.mjs';console.log('[Mermaid] Module loaded');mermaid.initialize({startOnLoad:false});console.log('[Mermaid] Mermaid initialized');mermaid.run();console.log('[Mermaid] Mermaid.run() executed');`;s.onerror=(e)=>{console.error('[Mermaid] Script error:',e);};s.onload=()=>{console.log('[Mermaid] Script loaded successfully');};document.head.appendChild(s);console.log('[Mermaid] Script appended to head');}catch(e){console.error('[Mermaid] Error in init:',e);}};const readyState=document.readyState;console.log('[Mermaid] Current readyState:',readyState);if(readyState==='loading'){console.log('[Mermaid] Waiting for DOMContentLoaded');document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded',init);}else{console.log('[Mermaid] DOM already ready, calling init immediately');init();}})();
